title: Arctic Swain Skin
body:
Its a little late, but can we all just stop and appreciate how awesome this skin is? It makes him look like a bad ass Russian general and has different particle effects, all for 750 RP.

(Now if only Grim Reaper Karthus could get the same treatment.....)

replies.body: Will you guys ever revisit Sabretusk Sejuani's skin and at least change the colors of the particles like you did with Shadow Evelynn and Artic Swain?currently, the icy blue particulars does not match at all. I feel it was a missed opportunity when you guys gave her a gameplay update.

Hmm. I'll mention Sabre Sej to some folks. There are slightly different considerations in play when we do (or rather, _[did](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-us/2017/06/champion-roadmap-june-2017/)_) class updates compared to VGUs. With multiple champs, the work often grew at a faster rate than the team working on it. As a result, yeah, we probably missed that opportunity...

It's really cool to hear about this info.

It's a shame this stuff become standard so late.

Poppy and Shen were left with such poor skins following their reworks. 
Noxus Poppy, Sabretusk Seju and Blood Moon Shen had so much potential as Alternate fantasy skins for these champs.
Instead they just ended up as 'meh' remodels. 

Even worse with how much work Maokai got in his gameplay update in comparison.
Yes I find Nothern Front really nice, way better than tyrant.
